mapper.sql: id, plat_id, grole_id, ip, time, device_id, `from`, order_id, payway, real_amount, amount, gm_cnt, status, rebate_cnt, role_id, remark
mapper.insert: insert into tb_comm_mem_order (id, plat_id, grole_id, ip, time, device_id, `from`, order_id, payway, real_amount, amount, gm_cnt, status, rebate_cnt, role_id, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{from,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gmCnt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{rebateCnt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update tb_comm_mem_order
plat_id = #{platId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grole_id = #{groleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=BIGINT},
time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`from` = #{from,jdbcType=TINYINT},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payway = #{payway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gm_cnt = #{gmCnt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
rebate_cnt = #{rebateCnt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_comm_mem_order set plat_id = #{platId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grole_id = #{groleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=BIGINT}, time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `from` = #{from,jdbcType=TINYINT}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payway = #{payway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gm_cnt = #{gmCnt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, rebate_cnt = #{rebateCnt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_comm_mem_order
plat_id = #{platId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grole_id = #{groleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`from` = #{from,jdbcType=TINYINT},
payway = #{payway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gm_cnt = #{gmCnt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
rebate_cnt = #{rebateCnt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tmo.order_id orderName, FROM_UNIXTIME(tmo.time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') orderTime, tmo.real_amount orderPrice, tmo.real_amount*0.3 orderCommission from tb_comm_members tm LEFT JOIN tb_comm_mem_grole tmg on tmg.mem_id = tm.id LEFT JOIN tb_comm_mem_order tmo on tmo.grole_id = tmg.id where tm.id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT};
